caption.center: Billy Joe BUCHANAN and Linda Buchanan v. STATE of Mississippi.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Winston County; Clarence E. Morgan, Jr., Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
R.W. Boydstun, Jr., Louisville, for appellants.
Bill Allain, Atty. Gen. by Carolyn B. Mills, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., Jackson, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before PATTERSON, C.J., and SUGG and BROOM, JJ.
